text: Verulam may refer to: ==People== * Baron Verulam * Earl of Verulam ==Places== * Verulam, KwaZulu-Natal * Verulam Township, Ontario * Common abbreviation of Verulamium, third-largest city in Roman Britain, near modern-day St Albans ==Other== * Radio Verulam, a community radio station in West Hertfordshire * HMS Verulam (ship) * Verulam School, state secondary school in St Albans, England
title: Verulam
